measure.name: residential_lighting_other
measure.description: Sets (or replaces) the lighting energy use, based on fractions of CFLs, LFLs, and LEDs, for the garage and outside. For multifamily buildings, the lighting can be set for all units of the building. See https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudio-BuildStock#workflows for supported workflows using this measure.
measure.modeler_description: Assigns a lighting energy use and schedule to the garage and outside. The lighting schedule, by default, is calculated for the latitude/longitude of the weather location specified in the model.

argument.name: option_type
argument.description: Inputs are used/ignored below based on the option type specified.

argument.name: hw_cfl
argument.description: Fraction of all hardwired lamps (garage and exterior) that are compact fluorescent. Hardwired lighting not specified as CFL, LED, or LFL is assumed to be incandescent.

argument.name: hw_led
argument.description: Fraction of all hardwired lamps (garage and exterior) that are LED. Hardwired lighting not specified as CFL, LED, or LFL is assumed to be incandescent.

argument.name: hw_lfl
argument.description: Fraction of all hardwired lamps (garage and exterior) that are linear fluorescent. Hardwired lighting not specified as CFL, LED, or LFL is assumed to be incandescent.

argument.name: pg_cfl
argument.description: Fraction of all plugin lamps that are compact fluorescent. Plugin lighting not specified as CFL, LED, or LFL is assumed to be incandescent.

argument.name: pg_led
argument.description: Fraction of all plugin lamps that are LED. Plugin lighting not specified as CFL, LED, or LFL is assumed to be incandescent.

argument.name: pg_lfl
argument.description: Fraction of all plugin lamps that are linear fluorescent. Plugin lighting not specified as CFL, LED, or LFL is assumed to be incandescent.

argument.name: mult
argument.description: A multiplier on the national average lighting energy. 0.75 indicates a 25% reduction in the lighting energy, 1.0 indicates the same lighting energy as the national average, 1.25 indicates a 25% increase in the lighting energy, etc.

argument.name: in_eff
argument.description: The ratio of light output from an incandescent lamp to the electric power it consumes.

argument.name: cfl_eff
argument.description: The ratio of light output from a CFL lamp to the electric power it consumes.

argument.name: led_eff
argument.description: The ratio of light output from a LED lamp to the electric power it consumes.

argument.name: lfl_eff
argument.description: The ratio of light output from a LFL lamp to the electric power it consumes.

argument.name: energy_use_garage
argument.description: Total garage annual lighting energy use. Only applied if there is a garage space.

argument.name: energy_use_exterior
argument.description: Total exterior annual lighting energy use.

argument.name: holiday_daily_energy_use_exterior
argument.description: Daily exterior lighting energy use during holiday period.

argument.name: holiday_start_date
argument.description: Date of the start of the holiday period.

argument.name: holiday_end_date
argument.description: Date of the end of the holiday period.
